name: BRICKS AHEAD
description:
BRICKS AHEAD A physics based brick builder with a humorous twist.

You regret the day you moved to this wrecked place. There is a hole in the ceiling. An eccentric neighbour is raving upstairs and a shower of bricks is surely coming your way. Lovely. Just don’t forget - “when life gives you bricks make a tower!”

The game features:

  • Physics based building
  • Four types of bricks to build with
  • Object rotation on all axes
  • Measuring the height of the built structure
  • Time rewind option
  • A dark-humour setting

Controls:

  • Mouse wheel - hover around
  • Mouse button left - pick and place objects
  • Q - rotate horisontal left
  • E - rotate horisontal right
  • Z - rotate vertical sideways
  • X - rotate vertical overhead
  • R - rewind time
  • Del / backspace - restart
  • Esc - quit

Credits:

  • @alexionder - programming
  • @mkrup - programming
  • @setonis - music
